snippet.title: Paradigm - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/600370
Pre-order on Humble: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/paradigm
Site: http://www.paradigmadventure.com/

On April 5th Enter the mutated world of Krusz. Date a toaster while you're there if you like. Coming to PC & Mac! (and Linux shortly after)

Music and sound design by Jonas Kjellberg 

Follow Paradigm
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ParadigmGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Paradigmgame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/paradigmgame/
Website: http://www.paradigmadventure.com/
